```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```



```{r, iris }
head(iris)
ggplot(iris, aes(x=Sepal.Length))+
  geom_histogram(fill="purple") -> myplot
ggsave("practice_plot.png", myplot)


```
